# value

**Instance Property**

The numeric value of the stepper.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var value: Double { get set }
```

## Discussion

When the value changes, the stepper sends the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIControl/Event/valueChanged] flag to its target (see [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIControl/addTarget(_:action:for:)]). Refer to the description of the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIStepper/isContinuous] property for information about whether value change events are sent continuously or when user interaction ends.

The default value for this property is `0`. This property is clamped at its lower extreme to [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIStepper/minimumValue] and is clamped at its upper extreme to [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIStepper/maximumValue].
